Quick search

Data Explorer¶

Description for basic attributes to be added here

Source Code¶

This module provides a class to generate a data explorer object. It can handle different kinds of inputs and generate quick overview, statistics and plots. It includes some subclasses to generate views and statistics for different types of features. These include:

  • Numerical

  • Categorical

  • Mixed Types

  • GIS (Geo Data)

  • Numerical by Time

class explorer.NumericalAnalyzer(data: Union[str, pandas.core.frame.DataFrame])[source]¶

Bases: baseattrs.BaseStats

a dictionary with each column name as key and the frequencies as value

class explorer.DataExplorer(data_source: Union[str, pandas.core.frame.DataFrame], target: str = '')[source]¶

Bases: baseattrs.BasicDataAttributes

Initializes a Data Explorer object. This object can be used to quickly generate insights of different features.

__init__(data_source: Union[str, pandas.core.frame.DataFrame], target: str = '')[source]¶

Initializes a Data Explorer Object. Takes a pandas DataFrame or a pointer to a data file and allows to quickly analyze it

Parameters

  • data_source (Union[str, pd.DataFrame]) – link to a file or a pandas DataFrame

  • target (str) – target column which is the interest of ML modeling

property Numerical_Data¶

Selects all numerical values and uses those as input values to create a Numerical_Data processor object.

Returns

a numerical data analyzer

property Data_Mixed_Types¶

A property which returns a data set of different types. This can be used to analyze relationships between different features of different types.

Returns

property Categorical_Data¶

A property which initializes a Categorical Analyzer for categorical values. Takes all categorical features and uses them in a Categorical Analyzer object.

Returns

A Categorical Data Analyzer

Return type

CategoricalAnalyzer

property Boolean_Data¶

A property which initializes a Categorical Analyzer for boolean values. Takes all boolean columns and uses them in a Categorical Analyzer object.

Returns

A Categorical Analyzer Object containing boolean values

Return type

CategoricalAnalyzer

property String_Data¶

A property which initializes a String Data Analyzer object. Takes all string columns and uses them in a Categorical Analyzer object.

Returns

a Categorical Analyzer with all string features

Return type

CategoricalAnalyzer

property Date_By_Data¶

A property which returns a Data By Date object. This can be used to analyze columns by time.

Returns

property GIS_Data¶

A property which initializes a GIS Analyzer by taking the first and second entry of the gis feature list.

Returns

property Gis_DataWithLabel¶

A property which returns all gis features with a corresponding label. This is intended to check for clustering algorithms results

Returns

a GisDatawithLabel object to analyze geo data and corresponding labels

property GIS_features¶

A property which returns all gis features of the DataFrame

Returns

a list of GIS features
